title: Stuck at honor 0
body: So my honor level dropped to 0 after I dcd'd a few games about a month ago (which wasn't my fault). Since then I've played like 50+ games, but it's not moving out from honor 0 despite not afking from any games. I'm pretty sure this is a bug, could a rioter investigate this. It's on my wulphoflegends account.

replies.body: Honor 0 would not be a result of [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) penalties, but behavioral incidents marked by the [Instant Feedback System](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207489286-Instant-Feedback-System-FAQ-).  It may take a bit to get your level back up, and it can slow down if you have less than honorable games throughout.  Keep playing honorably, and you'll get it back!
